configuration.description: Your Site's 'Shared Key' is a value that only you and Chargify know. It is used to generate unguessable URLs for the pages hosted by Chargify that your customers may interact with pages like Self-Service Pages.

configuration.name: config
configuration.label: Events
configuration.value:
In order to listen to Chargify events you will need to configure a webhook on Chargify:
  • Access to the 'Settings' page, 'Webhooks' tab.
  • Enable 'Send Webhooks to my Webhook URL(s)'.
  • Push 'Add URL', copy the value of 'Webhook URL' in this form and save.
  • Push 'Configure', enable the following 'Webhook Subscriptions' and save:
    • Signup Success
    • Signup Failure
    • Subscription State Change
    • Expiring Card
    • Customer Update

configuration.name: config2
configuration.label: Self-Service Pages URLs
configuration.value:
In order to enable the 'calculateSelfServiceUrl' function (used to generate the Self-Service Pages URLs) you will need to configure the 'Site Shared key' field:
  • Access to the 'Settings' page, 'Self-Service Page URLs' tab.
  • Copy the value of 'Site Shared Key' in this form and save.
